statements: DELETE FROM social_media_engagement WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND engagement_rate < 2.5;
DELETE FROM customer_sentiment_metrics WHERE customer_id = 100 AND sentiment_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM social_media_engagement WHERE platform IN ('Instagram', 'Twitter') AND engagement_rate < 2.5;
DELETE FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes_count > 100 AND shares_count < 50
DELETE FROM comments WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND sentiment_type = 'positive';
DELETE FROM comments WHERE commenter_name = 'John Doe' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM PostReactions WHERE user_id = 100 AND reaction_type = 'like';
DELETE FROM UserProfiles WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01' AND username = 'testuser';
